name: Sally
description:
A game for Ludum Dare 46

It's a story about Sally, in space.

Please see screenshot 3 for game help.

  • Fonts: Fixedsys – pixel fonts created by bathos free to use and alter for everyone.
  • Background music: Endless Space by SolusLunes
